message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $10,000.  I believe this reflects its worth, but I'm open to discussing further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $8,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $8,000 is below its true value.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $8,500. I hope this suggestion is within your consideration.
